Text.Page: I have some equipment upgrades for you, if you're interested.
Marmundam opened the Highwatch armory to help outfit you for your next adventure.

Only the best gear will do for a true friend like yourself.

Here, take this weapon box.

Before you equip your new weapon, you'll first have to tune its enchantments to your combat style.

Selecting superior enchantment effects is the best way to increase your item level, but you probably already knew that.

You'll need some new armor to go with that fine weapon of yours!

Remember, select superior enchantment effects whenever possible, and you'll become much stronger.
